snippet.textDisplay:
NINTENDO, Y U NO BRING "DISASTER: DAY OF CRISIS" TO AMERICA?!?!

I am still upset about that....I really don't understand it. If they can bring Pokemon and other games like that over, then why not Disaster: DoC? I freaking LOVE this game!! It's SO unfair... :C

But thank you very kindly for uploading the Main Menu OST of Disaster: DoC...I might use it when I draw Ray in one of the natural disasters...but which one is the absolute best..? I like the Firestorm, although I like 'em all..  :O

snippet.textDisplay:
Judge the game by its quality, NOT by a feature that is or is not in the game!

Also, I don't want to explore this sea...It makes me nauseated and it was plain boring and stupid...

If you want to judge the games based on the exploration alone, then let me talk you about another element...The stealth parts...The Zelda games(except OoT) did not have stealth gameplay...The WW is the first to use it so often...Judge this!
snippet.textOriginal:
Judge the game by its quality, NOT by a feature that is or is not in the game!

Also, I don't want to explore this sea...It makes me nauseated and it was plain boring and stupid...

If you want to judge the games based on the exploration alone, then let me talk you about another element...The stealth parts...The Zelda games(except OoT) did not have stealth gameplay...The WW is the first to use it so often...Judge this!
